 Pro-government militias from the city of Misrata have been moving to defend Tripoli

articles.title: Trump lawyer dismisses tax return demand
articles.description: Mr Trump's lawyers hit back after a Congressional committee demanded to see six years of his returns.

 Unlike previous presidents, Mr Trump has not published his tax details
